#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{long n,i;
double a,f,bal;int flag=0;
char arr[1000010]={0};
scanf("%ld",&n);
getchar();
scanf("%s",arr);
scanf("%lf %lf",&a,&f);
i=0;bal=0;
while(i<n)
{if(arr[i]=='L')
bal+=a;
else
bal-=a;
if(bal>=f||(bal)<=-f)
{flag=1;
break;}
i++;}
if(flag)
        printf("NO\n");
    else
        printf("YES\n");
    return 0;
}
